# asylum

The `asylum` package provides easy access to asylum and resettlement datasets for the UK, published by the Home Office.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("britishredcrosssociety/asylum")
```

## Getting help

If you encounter a clear bug, please file an issue with a minimal
reproducible example on
[GitHub](https://github.com/britishredcrosssociety/asylum/issues).
